code: import axios from"axios";export const deleteQuestion=async(spaceId,questionId,userId)=>{const path="/spaces/".concat(spaceId,"/").concat(questionId,"/").concat(userId,"/question/delete");try{const response=await axios.delete(path,{data:{userId:userId,spaceId:spaceId,questionId:questionId},headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Accept:'application/json',Authorization:'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem('token')}});return response.data;}catch(e){console.error('Error deleting received comments:',e.message);return false;}};
